model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Concrete class for a ball and defines its reasonable field and some common methods
    Author:
    Renqin, Yiqing Lu
